text.トレセン学園では日々たくさんの出来事が起こります。\\n<color=#ff99:
A lot of things happen every day at the Tracen Academy. 
Choose a <color=#ff9900>nurturing scenario</color> and solve the problems 
surrounding the school. Conquering these scenarios 
will help your horsegirl grow!
text.ウマ娘と<color=#ff9900>トゥインクル・シリーズ</color>で3:
Spend 3 years with a horsegirl in the <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Series</color> 
and work together to make their <color=#ff9900>dreams come true</color> 
! The horsegirls' goals are diverse. Guide many 
different girls to become a great trainer.
text.ウマ娘たちは個性豊かな子ばかり。\\nウマ娘ごとに基礎能力やスキル、適性などが異:
All of the horsegirls have unique personalities. Each Uma 
Musume has different basic abilities, skills, and aptitudes. 
You can train them as many times as you like, so let's start 
by <color=#ff9900>raising your favorite horsegirl</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>想い（因子）</color>を受け継がせてみましょ:
Inheriting <color=#ff9900>feelings (factors)</color> increases ability and aptitude at 
the start of training, and your horsegirl will grow through 
<color=#ff9900>Inheritance Events</color>. Inherited girls won't disappear from the 
Hall of Fame, so take advantage to raise stronger horsegirl!
text.サポートカードを<color=#ff9900>編成</color>してみましょう: <color=#ff9900>Organize</color> support cards to receive corresponding <color=#ff9900>support effects</color> \nand <color=#ff9900>training events</color> from those characters. Note that you can \nnot use cards of the horsegirl you are training.
text.サポートカードには<color=#ff9900>タイプ（得意トレーニング）</c: There are <color=#ff9900>types (specialty training)</color> of support cards. The \neffects they exhibit when training together are different.
text.育成中にサポートカードの絆ゲージを上げて、\\n得意トレーニングを行うと<col:
When you raise the bond gauge of your support card during 
training and perform your specialty training, <color=#ff9900>Friendship 
Training</color> will occur. In Friendship Training, your horsegirl 
will grow bigger than normal!
text.<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して<color:
Use <color=#ff9900>enhancement items</color> to increase your <color=#ff9900>Awakening Lv</color>. Raising 
your Awakening Lv will increase the number of skills you can 
acquire during training. Reinforcement items can be obtained 
through training and daily races.
text.<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘のピース</color>を使用して<colo: Use <color=#ff9900>horsegirl pieces</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> them. This will increase the \nbasic ability of the horsegirl. Also, when they reach ★3 \nthey will receive a <color=#ff9900>victory outfit</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートPt</color>と<color=#ff:
Use your <color=#ff9900>Support Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Money</color> to <color=#ff9900>increase the Lv</color>. As the Lv 
increases, your support effects will increase, giving you an 
edge in your training. Strengthening items can be obtained 
through training and daily races.
text.<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: Use <color=#ff9900>copies of the same support card</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color>. Uncapping \nincreases the upper level limit and you can further \nstrengthen the support card's Lvl.
text.複数枚所持しているサポートカードは<color=#ff9900>蹄鉄</colo:
Support cards dupes can be converted into <color=#ff9900>Horseshoes</color> 
. These valuable items can be exchanged in the store. 
The first support card you acquire will be stored in 
the support card list, subsequent cards will be displayed 
in the vault and can be converted.
text.育成を完了すると<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>とな:
When you complete training, your horsegirl will be saved in 
the <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame</color>. Once there, she can enter the Team Stadium 
and various races, can be inherited in training, or 
transferred, upon which she is irrevocably lost.
text.育成ウマ娘のピースは<color=#ff9900>クローバー</color>に変:
Horsegirl pieces can be converted into <color=#ff9900>clovers</color>. Clovers are 
valuable and can be exchanged for items in the store. Be 
careful when converting pieces, as they can be used to release 
the horsegirl you are training and to develop new talents.
text.チーム＜シリウス＞を率いて、\\nウマ娘たちと<color=#ff9900>メイ: Lead your team, Sirius, through the <color=#ff9900>main story</color> with the Uma \nMusume! You can earn rewards by progressing through the story.
text.育成ウマ娘と出会ったり<color=#ff9900>親愛度</color>を高め: Meeting new horsegirls and increasing their <color=#ff9900>affection</color> allows \nyou to progress through <color=#ff9900>their personal stories</color>. Rewards are \ngained for progressing through the stories.
text.殿堂入りウマ娘で<color=#ff9900>チーム</color>を結成し、\:
Form a <color=#ff9900>team</color> of Hall of Fame horsegirls and compete against 
teams from all over the country in the <color=#ff9900>Team Stadium</color>. Your team's 
<color=#ff9900>CLASS</color> will increase according to its success, and each week you 
will earn rewards according to the CLASS you belong to.
text.優れたレース結果を残すと<color=#ff9900>ハイスコア</color>: A <color=#ff9900>high score</color> will be recorded for outstanding race \nresults. Each week, the CLASS to which you belong \nwill change based on your high score.
text.チーム競技場では、一度に<color=#ff9900>条件の異なる5レース</c:
In the Team Stadium, five races with different <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> are 
held at a time. The higher your CLASS, the more people you can 
run in each race, up to a maximum of 15 horsegirls. Form the 
strongest team you can and challenge the Team Stadium!
text.<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>たちを編成し、<co:
Form your own <color=#ff9900>team</color> of <color=#ff9900>Hall of Famers</color>. For each of 
the five races with different conditions, choose 
the horsegirl with the best aptitude. The <color=#ff9900>ace</color> horse 
girl will get <color=#ff9900>1.1 times</color> the score.
text.強い殿堂入りウマ娘を編成すると、\\n<color=#ff9900>チーム評価<: The more strong horsegirls you have in your team, the higher \nyour <color=#ff9900>team rating</color> will be and the higher your <color=#ff9900>team rank</color> will be. \nThe higher your team rank, the more rewards you can earn.
text.チーム競技場では<color=#ff9900>チーム評価の近い相手</color:
In the Team Stadium, you will play against <color=#ff9900>opponents 
with similar team ratings</color>. The higher your team 
rating, the higher your score will be. Form a 
strong team and conquer the Team Stadium!
text.殿堂入りウマ娘でレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\nレースの着順が良いほ:
Challenge the Legend Race with your saved horsegirls. The 
higher you finish, the more rewards you get. Tickets required 
for participation are replenished at 05:00 during the event 
period and when the LEGEND horsegirl is switched.
text.殿堂入りウマ娘でデイリーレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\n挑戦するレースに応じて: Take on the Daily Race with your Hall of Fame horsegirl. You \ncan earn various rewards depending on the races you challenge. \nEach day, you will receive up to the <color=#ff9900>maximum number of tickets</color>.
text.練習では、<color=#ff9900>好きな条件で</color>自由にレース:
In Practice, you can freely hold races under <color=#ff9900>any conditions 
you want</color>. In addition to the Hall of Fame horsegirls you have 
bred, you can also run races with <color=#ff9900>other trainers' horsegirls</color>. 
You can hold practice with up to 18 horsegirls at once!
text.チーム競技場やルームマッチなどで見かけた気になるウマ娘を\\n<color=#f:
If you see any horsegirl you like in the Team Stadium 
or room match, you can register her as your <color=#ff9900>Training 
Partner</color> so that you can run races with her. The representative 
horsegirl of the friends you are following will also 
be able to run in the race.
text.自慢の<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>をサークルやS: You can <color=#ff9900>share</color> your favorite <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame horsegirl</color> with your \ncircle and SNS. Actively register your Practice Partners from \ncircle members and friends to enhance your practice!
text.全国のトレーナーたちと<color=#ff9900>サークルに加入</color: Join a <color=#ff9900>circle</color> with other trainers from around \nthe country. You can interact with other members \nand help each other with training.
text.メンバー同士で<color=#ff9900>様々なアイテム</color>を贈り: Members can give each other a <color=#ff9900>variety of items</color>\n. You can also rent each other's <color=#ff9900>representative \nhorsegirl</color> for inheritance at a discount.
text.獲得した<color=#ff9900>楽曲</color>のライブを視聴すること:
<size=26>You can watch live performances of <color=#ff9900>songs</color> you have acquired. 
Choose main and back dancers from obtained horsegirls 
and acquired costumes to watch the live with your favorite 
combination. Songs marked with <color=#ff9900>"Singing"</color>, are voiced 
by the selected horsegirl. Songs can be acquired through 
the main story and training.</size>
text.トレーナー情報の確認や設定が行えます。\\n<color=#ff9900>誕生日:
You can check and set your trainer information. On your 
<color=#ff9900>birthday</color>, you will receive a congratulatory comment from Uma 
Musume on the home screen, and changing your <color=#ff9900>gender</color> will change 
some scenarios. (Gender can be changed at any time)
text.<color=#ff9900>代表ウマ娘</color>や<color=#ff9:
You can set up a <color=#ff9900>representative horsegirl</color> and <color=#ff9900>support card</color> to 
help your followers in their training. You will earn <color=#ff9900>Friend Pt 
the next day</color> depending on the number of times you do this. 
(This will be given as a gift)
text.<color=#ff9900>称号ミッション</color>や<color=#f: You can earn titles through <color=#ff9900>title missions</color> and <color=#ff9900>events</color>. You can \nchange the title you have earned at any time.
text.理事長の夢に協力し、コンプリートを目指してみましょう！\\n育成中の重賞レースや:
Help the Chairman reach her dream! You can earn <color=#ff9900>trophies and 
rewards</color> when you win graded races during training, or Legend 
Races. In addition, you can earn rewards by completing 
missions to collect the specified number of trophies.
text.<color=#ff9900>フォロー</color>したフレンドの代表ウマ娘や:
You can select the representative horsegirl and support 
card of the friends you <color=#ff9900>follow</color> from each list in training. 
You also earn more Friend Pt by helping a <color=#ff9900>mutual follower</color> 
to train. If you don't have many followers, try looking 
in the <color=#ff9900>recommendations</color>.
text.ウマ娘に関わる記録を集めて<color=#ff9900>名鑑Lv</color>:
Collect records related to horsegirls to raise your <color=#ff9900>Index Lv</color>. 
You'll accumulate Index Exp based on the evaluation points 
you've earned through training and the stories you've viewed, 
and you'll earn rewards as your Index Lv increases.
text.狙いを定めてウマ娘ぬいぐるみ（ぱかプチ）をGETしましょう！\\n挑戦回数<co: Take aim and get the horsegirl Plushie (Paka-Puchi)! If you \ncan get at least one of them in <color=#ff9900>3 attempts</color>, you've succeeded. \nYour horsegirl might then wake up with a <color=#ff9900>new hint</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>CLASS2</color>昇級おめでとうございま:
Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 2</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>second slot</color> for 
team formation has been released. The second slot for team 
formation has been released, allowing you to organize more Uma 
Musume for the Hall of Fame.
text.<color=#ff9900>CLASS3</color>昇級おめでとうございま: Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 3</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>third \nslot</color> for team formation has been released, allowing \nyou to organize more Hall of Fame horsegirls.
text.育成では、ウマ娘ごとに設定された<color=#ff9900>目標レース</co:
The aim of the training is to achieve good results 
in the <color=#ff9900>target races</color> set for each horsegirl. In order 
to achieve good results in races, you need to <color=#ff9900>develop 
your basic abilities</color> through <color=#ff9900>training</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>スキル</color>を獲得することで、<colo:
By acquiring <color=#ff9900>skills</color>, you can gain a <color=#ff9900>variety of 
effects</color> in <color=#ff9900>races</color>. The Skill Points needed to acquire 
skills are mainly obtained through races, but can 
also be obtained through some events.
text.<color=#ff9900>体力が少なくなったり</color>、<color:
If your horsegirl's <color=#ff9900>energy or motivation is low</color> she will not 
be able to perform at her best in training or races. <color=#ff9900>Resting</color> 
restores energy, and <color=#ff9900>going out</color> boosts motivation. Always pay 
attention to her condition!
text.育成中、ウマ娘のトレーニングや体調に悪い影響を及ぼす\\n<color=#ff9:
During training, you may acquire <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> that have a 
negative effect on your horsegirl's training and physical 
condition. The <color=#ff9900>Infirmary</color> can eliminate such conditions, 
so think about making use of it quickly.
text.ウマ娘の育成中はさまざまなコマンドを実行できます！\\nそれぞれのコマンドをバラ: You can execute various commands while training your Uma \nMusume! Use each command in a well-balanced manner to make \nyour horsegirl into a great horsegirl!
text.ジュニア級6月後半からは<color=#ff9900>レース</color>に出:
<size=26>From the latter half of June in Junior class, you can start 
<color=#ff9900>racing</color>. Train your horsegirl well and aim for <color=#ff9900>first place</color>! In 
races, you earn <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> to acquire skills and <color=#ff9900>Fans</color> to run 
in big races, based on your finishing position. You'll also 
earn random items based on your position and margin.</size>
text.ウマ娘たちは<color=#ff9900>メイクデビュー</color>で初めて:
Horsegirls make their first appearance on the racing stage in 
their <color=#ff9900>make debut</color>. If they finish first, they can run in 
various races. If they don't, you'll have to try to win one of 
the <color=#ff9900>Maiden Races</color> available!
text.トレーニングで得られるスピードやスタミナなどの<color=#ff9900>基礎:
<color=#ff9900>Basic abilities</color> such as speed and stamina, 
gained through training, are linked to <color=#ff9900>the various 
abilities displayed during races</color>. Which you need varies 
greatly with <color=#ff9900>distance</color> and <color=#ff9900>running strategy</color>, so <color=#ff9900>create 
a training menu that suits her</color>!
text.レースが行われる<color=#ff9900>バ場</color>と<color:
The <color=#ff9900>surface and distance</color> where the races take place differ. 
Your horsegirl suits different tracks depending on her 
<color=#ff9900>surface and distance aptitudes</color>. Aim for races that are <color=#ff9900>marked 
with a ★</color> in the list, and go for the win!
text.レースは<color=#ff9900>プレオープン・オープン・GⅢ・GⅡ・GⅠ<: The races are divided into five grades: <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open, GIII, \nGII, and GI</color>. Let's start with the <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open</color> to win the \nhighest G1 race in the Twinkle Series!
text.<color=#ff9900>体力</color>を消費して<color=#ff:
You can grow your horsegirl's <color=#ff9900>basic abilities</color> by 
spending <color=#ff9900>energy</color> to <color=#ff9900>train</color> her. In addition to <color=#ff9900>recovering</color> 
energy, more <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> can be gained from the 
Wisdom training than other training.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートカード</color>に編成されたウマ娘と:
Training with horsegirls organized as a <color=#ff9900>support card</color> will 
increase your <color=#ff9900>training efficiency and bond gauge</color>. When the 
bond gauge is full, <color=#ff9900>Friendship Training</color> can occur. You may <color=#ff9900>gain 
various benefits</color> if certain others watch you train as well.
text.トレーニングでサポートカードのウマ娘に<color=#ff9900>「！」マーク:
When a support card horsegirl has a <color=#ff9900>! mark</color> on her, grab your 
chance to <color=#ff9900>increase Hint Lv of one of this partner's skills</color> upon 
successfully completing the training session. This will confer 
a <color=#ff9900>discount on the Skill Pt needed to acquire the skill</color>.
text.ウマ娘の<color=#ff9900>体力が少ない</color>状態でトレーニ:
If you train your horsegirl when her <color=#ff9900>energy is low</color>, she may 
<color=#ff9900>fail the training</color> and her ability may not improve. There are 
<color=#ff9900>various disadvantages</color> to failing a training session, so always 
keep an eye on her <color=#ff9900>energy and failure rate</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>スキルPt</color>を消費することで、レース:
By spending <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color>, you can acquire <color=#ff9900>skills</color> that activate 
during races. There are various conditions to activate skills, 
such as the <color=#ff9900>race distance and running strategy</color>, so try to 
<color=#ff9900>acquire skills that match her aptitudes</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>サポートカードイベント</color>や<colo:
The <color=#ff9900>hint Lv</color> of a skill may be increased by the result 
of a <color=#ff9900>Support Card or Horsegirl Event</color>. The skill Pt 
you <color=#ff9900>consume will be discounted</color> depending on the hint 
Lv, so organize support cards that have the skills 
you want to acquire to get the best deals.
text.スキルには大きく分けて次の3種類があります。\\n・<color=#ff9900:
<size=26>There are three main types of skills. <color=#ff9900>Unique skills</color> are special 
skills that your horsegirl starts with. <color=#ff9900>Rare skills</color> are 
powerful skills found in special situations. <color=#ff9900>Normal Skills</color> are 
skills found in various situations. There are also skills that 
can only be acquired by <color=#ff9900>inheriting certain factors</color>.</size>
text.サポートカードのLvを一定までUPすると\\n<color=#ff9900>チー:
If you raise the level of your support card to a 
certain level, you will get a <color=#ff9900>support bonus 
that will increase your score in the Team Stadium</color>. 
Let's raise the lvl of many support cards!
text.イベントやキャンペーンなどで解放された<color=#ff9900>限定ストーリ: You can view <color=#ff9900>limited stories</color> that have been \nreleased through events and campaigns.
text.今年も始まった、トレセン学園の夏合宿！ 合宿中のウマ娘を\\n研究できるといつに:
Another year's summer camp is underway at Tracen Academy! 
With her sights set on studying students at camp, Agnes Tachyon 
is in unusually high spirits. Meanwhile, Silence Suzuka is feeling 
more down, unable to acclimate to life at camp. Then comes 
a certain suggestion from Air Groove… Summer is a special time 
for experiencing the gentle sparkle of fleeting moments.
text.イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>し、<: During the event period, <color=#ff9900>train your horsegirl</color> and earn <color=#ff9900>Event \nPoints</color>. By collecting Event Points, you can earn various <color=#ff9900>rewards</color>.
text.イベントPtを集めることで\\n<color=#ff9900>イベント限定ストー:
Collecting Event Points will allow you to advance through the 
<color=#ff9900>event-only story</color>. By advancing the story and clearing event 
missions, you can earn <color=#ff9900>event limited support cards, rainbow 
fragments, and titles</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>イベントボーナス育成ウマ娘、イベントボーナスサポー: At the end of training, any <color=#ff9900>event bonus horsegirls or support \ncards</color> will confer a <color=#ff9900>bonus to the event points gained</color>.
text.イベントミッションをクリアすると\\n<color=#ff9900>イベントPt: You can get <color=#ff9900>Event Pt and Roulette Coins</color> by \ncompleting event missions. You can also earn \nRoulette Coins from the <color=#ff9900>daily missions</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>ルーレットコイン</color>を使って<colo: You can play <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color> using <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> \nIf you <color=#ff9900>achieve bingo</color>, you can get <color=#ff9900>event limited \nsupport cards and gold fragments</color>.
text.イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>したり: During the event period, you can earn <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> by \n<color=#ff9900>training horsegirls</color> and completing <color=#ff9900>event missions</color>. Collect \n<color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color>to spin the <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color> wheel.
text.ルーレットダービーでの着順に応じて\\n<color=#ff9900>ルーレット: You can get <color=#ff9900>roulette rewards</color> according to your finishing order \nin the roulette derby. When you get a roulette reward you've \nnever gotten before, it's your chance to BINGO!
text.獲得したルーレット報酬に応じたマスが埋まります。\\n縦・横・斜めの連続する3マ:
Cells will be filled according to roulette rewards earned. 
When 3 consecutive squares are filled (on any axis), <color=#ff9900>a line is 
completed</color>, and you will receive a <color=#ff9900>BINGO reward</color> based on number 
of lines. Complete <color=#ff9900>8 lines of BINGO</color>to exchange your first 3 sheets.
text.6月後半と12月後半のターン終了後に開催される\\n<color=#ff9900:
Run in the <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Hai</color>, held the turn after June and December 
end, and aim for victory with your team. Winning will increase 
your <color=#ff9900>team ranking</color>, and your <color=#ff9900>horsegirl and team members will 
grow</color>. Train a strong horsegirl to <color=#ff9900>win lots of Aoharu Hai</color>!
text.チームメンバーを編成して、アオハル杯の優勝をめざしましょう！\\nアオハル杯は各:
Put together a team to win the Aoharu Hai! With races in each 
category, the winner will be the one with <color=#ff9900>more wins</color> out of 
five. <color=#ff9900>Winning raises your team ranking</color>, more so the higher 
your opponent's ranking.
text.集めたピースを使用することで、育成ウマ娘を<color=#ff9900>解放</: By using the pieces you have collected, you can <color=#ff9900>release</color> \nyour breeding horsegirl. Once released, you will \nbe able to take charge of them in training.
text.3人のウマ娘を出走登録し、<color=#ff9900>全国のトレーナー</co: Register 3 horsegirls to <color=#ff9900>match</color> and battle with <color=#ff9900>other trainers</color> \nin real time! Raise strong horsegirls and aim for glory!
text.<color=#ff9900>オープンリーグ</color>と<color=#f:
There are two leagues, the <color=#ff9900>Open League</color> and the <color=#ff9900>Grade 
League</color>, and you can choose the one that suits you 
best Depending on the league, the upper limit of the 
<color=#ff9900>breeding rank</color> of the Hall of Fame horsegirls you can 
register to run in the race will differ.
text.<color=#ff9900>ルームマッチ</color>は、他のトレーナーたち:
<color=#ff9900>Room Match</color> allows you to race against other trainers 
with your Hall of Fame horsegirls <color=#ff9900>Host</color>: Set your own 
conditions for the race <color=#ff9900>Join</color>: Join another trainer's 
race. <color=#ff9900>Watch</color>: Enter an ID to watch the race.
text.開催されるレースはGⅠが舞台となります。\\nレースを開催する場合は、2つのモー:
The race held will be GI. There are two modes. <color=#ff9900>Simple Mode</color> 
allows you to hold a race right away. <color=#ff9900>Detailed mode</color> allows you 
to choose weather, participation conditions, etc. first. Up to 
<color=#ff9900>3 horsegirls per person</color> can be entered.
text.<color=#ff9900>リーグの中は3つのラウンド</color>で構成さ:
<color=#ff9900>The league is made up of three rounds</color>. Starting from Round 2, 
you will be divided into Group A and Group B, and the places 
you advance to will depend on your performance in each round 
and group. Let's move on to the final round and win the <color=#ff9900>winner</color>!
text.開催したレースは参加リストから参加者を募集できます。\\n<color=#ff9:
Recruit participants for your races from the participation 
list. Trainers close to you can also be recruited using 
the <color=#ff9900>Circle and SNS Sharing functions</color>. For future reference, 
<color=#ff9900>you can save your favorite races</color>. Have a go organizing 
a race with your friends!
text.特別移籍では、殿堂入りウマ娘を<color=#ff9901>他のチームに移籍させ:
In the special transfer, you can transfer your Hall of Famer 
to another team and get a reward. Please note that once you 
send a Hall of Famer to another team, she will be gone and you 
will not be able to get her back.
text.移籍先チームの希望する条件に応じて<color=#ff9901>お礼品の内容が変:
<color=#ff9901>Reward contents will change</color> by application conditions of the 
team you wish to transfer to. In addition, each has its own 
expectations, and <color=#ff9901>the higher these are, the more luxurious</color> the 
reward for sending them a horsegirl.
text.期待度の高い募集の中にはお礼品として\\n移籍した<color=#ff9901>: Teams with high expectations will reward a piece of the \ntransferred <color=#ff9901>Hall of Fame horsegirl</color> as a thank you gift.
text.チームメンバーに特殊なアイコンが出ているトレーニング場所で\\nトレーニングを行:
If you train at a training location where a team member has a 
special icon, "<color=#ff9900>Aoharu Special Training</color>" will occur, and <color=#ff9900>that 
team member's basic abilities will increase</color>. Let's use the 
Aoharu Training to grow our team so we can win the Aoharu Hai!
text.さらに、<color=#ff9900>2人以上</color>のチームメンバーと:
Furthermore, a Special Training session <color=#ff9900>with 2 or more</color> 
team members, will <color=#ff9900>boost your horsegirl's training 
efficiency</color> as well. <color=#ff9900>Basic abilities and skill points 
gained</color> will also increase <color=#ff9900>the more team members</color> participate.
text.アオハル特訓を何回も行ったチームメンバーは、\\n一度だけ<color=#ff9:
Team members you have had many Special Trainings with 
can have an <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Spirit Explosion</color> once. Their <color=#ff9900>basic 
abilities will increase greatly</color> and <color=#ff9900>your horsegirl will 
also grow and get Skill Hints</color> The key to success is <color=#ff9900>generating 
many Aoharu Spirit Explosions</color>!
text.現在持っているアイテムを確認することができます。\\nまた、消費アイテムを使用す: You can check the items you currently have. You can also use \nconsumable items. Some items can be converted to Money. \n<color=#ff9900>Converting items cannot be undone</color>, so be careful.
text.チームメンバーが成長することで、<color=#ff9900>チーム総合力</c:
As team members grow, <color=#ff9900>team strength</color> will increase and you will 
receive gifts from Tazuna. Also, each member's <color=#ff9900>Training Lv 
will increase</color> with their basic ability. <color=#ff9900>The strength of your 
team will lead to the growth of your horsegirl</color> , so be 
proactive in training your team!
text.<color=#ff9900>チーム称号</color>とは、チーム総合力とチー:
The <color=#ff9900>team title</color> is an <color=#ff9900>evaluation of your overall</color> team strength 
and team ranking. <color=#ff9900>The better the team title you have, the more 
your horsegirl will grow in the ending</color> Let's win Aoharu Hai 
and get the strongest team title!
text.<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: Using <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color> you can spend twice the TP \nat the start of training to gain double the \n<color=#ff9900>Event Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Roulette coins</color> at the end.
text.<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: You can <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> support cards by using <color=#ff9900>duplicates of the same card</color> \n. The level limit will be increased. SR and SSR support cards \ncan also be uncapped by using <color=#ff9900>Release Crystals</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>ショータイムモード</color>で育成を完了する:
When you end training in <color=#ff9900>Showtime Mode</color>, your <color=#ff9900>SHOW Gauge</color> will 
rise according to your progress and the difficulty level. You 
will receive <color=#ff9900>additional rewards</color> according to the number of 
times you've filled your SHOW Gauge to MAX.
text.ショータイムモードでは、育成中のレースで、\\n<color=#ff9900>レ:
In Showtime Mode, the <color=#ff9900>opponent horsegirls</color> will become stronger 
in training races. When you see the <color=#ff9900>good ending of your Horsegirl 
</color> at the chosen difficulty level, the next level will be 
unlocked and can be challenged from next training.
text.<color=#ff9900>適性に合わせたウマ娘</color>を育成したり、: You can earn more points by training horsegirls \n<color=#ff9900>according to their aptitude</color> and by achieving \nthe specified <color=#ff9900>Score Bonus</color> conditions.
text.「<color=#ff9900>トレーナー技能試験</color>」で、\\n試: In the <color=#ff9900>Trainer Proficiency Exam</color>, you can check the <color=#ff9900>usage rate \nof support cards</color> for each test in the ranking!
text.本育成シナリオでは育成ウマ娘それぞれの目標はなく、\\n<color=#ff99:
A scenario without individual goals, <color=#ff9900>instead chasing "Result 
Points"</color>. Acquire fixed amounts from each of the 3 years! You 
can freely enter any races during training, and obtained Pts 
depend on the race's grade and finishing position!
text.<color=#ff9900>育成目標をすべて達成</color>すると\\n<: <color=#ff9900>Once all training objectives are complete</color>, you can challenge \nthe <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Star Climax</color>! Emerge victorious over the 3-race \nbattle to claim your place as "Twinkle Top Star"!
text.レースで入着すると成績Ptのほかに<color=#ff9900>「ショップコイン:
When entering races, you will <color=#ff9900>obtain Shop Coins</color>! Shop 
Coins can be traded for training items in the special 
shop. Training items can increase stats, recover energy, 
boost training growths, and have <color=#ff9900>various other effects 
that are sure to help your training</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>毎年12月後半のターン終了時</color>に、各:
<color=#ff9900>After each second half of December</color>, when changing years, <color=#ff9900>the 
most outstanding horsegirl is recognized</color>. Do well in races 
while deepening bonds with your supporters to increase your 
fans! When chosen, your horsegirl's unique skill will level 
up, in addition to other improvements!
text.育成中、レースに「ライバル」が出走することがあります。\\nライバルがいる<co:
Sometimes Rivals will enter races. When <color=#ff9900>entering and winning 
those races</color> your <color=#ff9900>horsegirl's stats will grow</color>, and she can 
<color=#ff9900>obtain Skill Hints</color>. Grow your horsegirls more by having them 
fight these tough opponents!
text.トゥインクルスタークライマックスでは、\\n<color=#ff9900>各レー:
In the Twinkle Star Climax, <color=#ff9900>you gain Result Pt based 
on your finishing position</color>, and the <color=#ff9900>horsegirl with 
the most Pts over 3 races is the winner</color>. Aim for the 
top with your carefully trained horsegirl!
text.繰り返し練習したいウマ娘たちを<color=#ff9900>マイ出走リスト</c:
Save Umas in <color=#ff9900>My Entrants</color> to <color=#ff9900>select them easily</color> during 
registration! You can also save them from the results screen. 
Removing Training Partners, will remove them from My Entrants 
as well, so be careful!
text.全試験の<color=#ff9900>最高スコア</color>で<color=: You can view the <color=#ff9900>Top 100 highest scorers</color> in the \nranking! The <color=#ff9900>Top 30 horsegirls</color> can be <color=#ff9900>rented \nwithout limit</color> in the relevant scenario.
text.<color=#ff9900>トライアルコイン</color>は試験によって得ら: <color=#ff9900>Trial Coins</color> are earned for exams, and extra can be earned \nthrough <color=#ff9900>Score Bonuses</color>, <color=#ff9900>Exam Grades</color>, and <color=#ff9900>Missions</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して、\\n育成: You can increase the <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv</color> of your horsegirl's skills by \nusing <color=#ff9900>upgrade items</color>. When doing so, she will start training \nwith her <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv already raised</color> for those skills.
text.レーシングカーニバルのレースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>カーニバル: Race in the Carnival to gain <color=#ff9900>Carnival Pts</color>. Points are awarded \nfor skill uses and finishing position.
text.<color=#ff9900>カーニバルレース</color>に挑戦すると<co: As you complete <color=#ff9900>Carnival Races</color>, your <color=#ff9900>Challenge Gauge</color> will fill. \nWhen full, you can enter a <color=#ff9900>Challenge Race</color>. Challenge Races \ncome in <color=#ff9900>VERY HARD and EXTREME</color> difficulties.
text.イベントレースで5着以内に入ると<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナス:
Your horsegirl will gain the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Factor</color> when 
finishing top 5 in an event race. When a horsegirl 
inherits this factor, she will gain <color=#ff9900>bonus stats and 
a chance to max mood</color> in the event races.
text.<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナススキル</color>を持つウマ: When a horsegirl with the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Bonus Skill</color> finishes top 5 \nin an event race, the factor will <color=#ff9900>Lv up</color>. The <color=#ff9900>stat bonus and \nmax mood chance will increase</color> with skill level.
text.レーシングカーニバルのレースで獲得した<color=#ff9900>カーニバルP: The <color=#ff9900>Carnival pts</color> obtained in Racing Carnival \nraces can be <color=#ff9900>traded for items</color> in the shop!
text.デイリーレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\n対戦するLEGENDウマ娘に: Challenge the daily Legend races! Pieces of \nthe challenged Legend horsegirl can be acquired. \nTickets will <color=#ff9900>refill to max</color> every day.
text.自分だけの<color=#ff9900>オリジナル名刺</color>を作成して: Create your own <color=#ff9900>Trainer Card</color>, and share it as an image on \nsocial media. Show your info along with horsegirl, support and \n<color=#ff9900>customizable graphics</color>.
text.代表ウマ娘が所持している<color=#ff9900>因子情報</color>に: <color=#ff9900>Factors</color> for your representative horsegirl can also be <color=#ff9900>shared on \nsocial media</color>. Show off your glorious horsegirl on your card!
text.<color=#ff9900>フォト機能</color>を活用することで、<co: The <color=#ff9900>Snapshot function</color> allows you to take photos of <color=#ff9900>Races, \nLives, and Stories</color>. Snapshots can be processed and \nedited in a few ways to add your own flair.
text.撮影したフォトは<color=#ff9900>フォトライブラリ</color>に: Saved snapshots are stored in the <color=#ff9900>Photo Library</color> and accessible at \nany time、They can also be used on your <color=#ff9900>Trainer or Circle Cards</color>.
text.初めての育成は、まずはウマ娘たちをより知るために\\n<color=#ff990:
For your first training <color=#ff9900>we recommend you play the URA Finals 
scenario</color> to get to know the horsegirls better! Many things 
happen on the path you both take towards her unique goals. 
Aim to win on the big, dream-like stage of the URA Finals!
text.本育成シナリオでしか見られない、\\n<color=#ff9900>シナリオ専用: Each scenario <color=#ff9900>has many exclusive events!</color> We hope you will enjoy \ndiscovering new aspects of the horsegirls through their daily \nlife and their expressions as they go through the seasons!
text.<color=#ff9900>みんなでトップウマドルプロジェクト</color>: <color=#ff9900>Everyone's Top Umadol Project</color> is an event where rewards are \ngained for obtaining fans through training. Personal rewards \nare obtained based on total fans gained in training mode.
text.<color=#ff9900>ゴルシちゃんモード</color>で育成を完了する: When finishing training in <color=#ff9900>Golshi-chan Mode</color> you \nwill gain rewards based on progress. In Golshi-chan \nmode <color=#ff9900>opponents in races</color> will be stronger.
text.イベント全体報酬は<color=#ff9900>イベントに参加した全トレーナーが: Overall rewards are based on <color=#ff9900>total fans gained by all trainers \nin the event</color>. The more fans, the more luxurious the rewards.
text.ルームマッチに参加させたいウマ娘を<color=#ff9900>\\nマイ出走リ: Save horsegirls in <color=#ff9900>My Entrants</color> to <color=#ff9900>select them easily</color> during \nregistration! You can also save them from the results screen.
text.育成ウマ娘の衣装をお気に入りのものに変更してみましょう！\\n<color=#f:
Dress your horsegirls in your favorite outfits! 
Changing the outfit of a horsegirl will change it 
for <color=#ff9900>all of her Hall of Fame versions</color>. Note that 
in some situations the outfit won't display.
text.育成開始前の最終確認からイベントブーストを選択し、\\n<color=#ff99: You can select <color=#ff9900>Double TP Usage</color> at the start of training to \n<color=#ff9900>double SHOW gauge fill rate</color> at the end.
text.全4回の告知ライブの後、<color=#ff9900>グランドライブ</colo: After 4 Promotional Lives, the <color=#ff9900>Grand Live</color> is held! \nKeeping things fresh and <color=#ff9900>learning various tracks</color> \nfor each Live will greatly benefit your horsegirls!
text.トレーニングを行うことで獲得できる<color=#ff9900>パフォーマンスは: Through training, <color=#ff9900>5 different Performances</color> can be earned! \nWhich ones go with which training changes every turn.
text.獲得できるパフォーマンスは<color=#ff9900>トレーニングLvの高さ<: The Performances earned increase with the \n<color=#ff9900>training's level</color> and the <color=#ff9900>amount of horsegirls participating</color>. \nFriendship training will also provide 2 Performances!
text.獲得したパフォーマンスは<color=#ff9900>レッスン</color>で: The Performances earned can be spend on <color=#ff9900>Lessons</color> to \ngain <color=#ff9900>Tracks or Live Techniques</color>. Both of these are \nhighly useful to the <color=#ff9900>development of your horsegirls</color>.
text.<color=#ff9900>レッスン</color>ではパフォーマンスを消費し:
Performances can be spent on <color=#ff9900>Lessons</color> to gain <color=#ff9900>Tracks or 
Live Techniques</color>! Learning these will provide an immediate 
<color=#ff9900>Talent Bonus</color>, and Tracks will additionally provide 
a <color=#ff9900>Live Bonus</color> which will be active from the next Live 
until the end of training.
text.習得に必要なパフォーマンスが足りないときは<color=#ff9900>予約</: When lacking the Performances for a Lesson, it can be \n<color=#ff9900>reserved</color>. Doing so will display the <color=#ff9900>Performances needed</color> \nto learn it in the Training screens.
text.楽曲を習得するたびに<color=#ff9900>ライブ期待度</color>が:
Each Track learned will increase the <color=#ff9900>Live Anticipation</color>. 
Maxing this gauge will ensure the live's <color=#ff9900>Great Success</color>. 
Anticipation will reset every live, so prepare new Tracks 
for each live!
text.<color=#ff9900>ライブ</color>では、<color=#ff9:
At a <color=#ff9900>Live</color>, the <color=#ff9900>songs learnt will be played</color>. With a specific 
number of new Tracks, the <color=#ff9900>live will be a Great Success</color>. 
Horsegirls will <color=#ff9900>grow more</color> when the live is a Great Sucess, 
so aim for this using the Anticipation gauge as reference.
text.新たに習得した楽曲がある状態でライブを終えると\\n次のターンから<color=: When new Tracks are played at a Live, their \n<color=#ff9900>Live Bonus</color> will be active from the next turn. \nSimilar bonuses will <color=#ff9900>stack</color>.
text.<color=#ff9901>特別移籍 StarHorse4 Edition</:
In <color=#ff9901>Special Transfer StarHorse4 Edition</color> 
you can transfer your trained horsegirls to another team 
to receive rewards. Be careful, the transfer is permanent, 
and you can't just call those girls back!
text.移籍先チームのウマ娘の募集には<color=#ff9901>期待度</color: The <color=#ff9901>expectations</color> of the receiving teams differ, and based on \nthat and the horsegirl you sent the rewards can change. \n<color=#ff9901>That one trainer</color> seems to have a request of <color=#ff9901>☆4 difficulty</color>!
text.期待度3の募集では、お礼品として\\n移籍した<color=#ff9901>殿堂: In ☆3 difficulty requests, you will receive <color=#ff9901>pieces of the \nhorsegirl you sent</color>. Moreover, from this difficulty onwards \nyou can get <color=#ff9901>Star Fruits</color> exclusive to this <color=#ff9901>StarHorse4 Edition</color>.
text.7人のチームで<color=#ff9900>スカウトレース</color>に挑み:
Take on Scout Races with a team of 7. The Team captain 
will be one of your trained horsegirls. The others can be 
selected through <color=#ff9900>scouting</color>. Build the strongest team through 
continuous <color=#ff9900>racing and scouting</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>スカウトレースチケット</color>は、毎日12:
You can obtain up to 5 <color=#ff9900>Scout Race Tickets</color> every day at 12. 
Daily missions and items can also grant you some. 
<color=#ff9900>Every 3 races</color>, the <color=#ff9900>race details</color> will change. You can check 
this from the Race Schedule.
text.スカウトレースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>スカウトPt</colo: Entering Scout Races will grant <color=#ff9900>Scout Pt</color>. The amount \nwill vary based on race result, opponent team rank, and \nany bonuses. Aim to win a variety of different races!
text.<color=#ff9900>スカウトタイム</color>では、相手チームのウ: During <color=#ff9900>Scout Time</color>, you can <color=#ff9900>scout</color> the opponent's horsegirls \nand swap around your own team. The <color=#ff9900>Scout Pt</color> needed \nto scout depend on the target horsegirl's rank.
text.チームを強化し、<color=#ff9900>チームランクを更新</color>: Strengthen your team and <color=#ff9900>increase team rank</color> to \nreceive rewards. In addition, clear <color=#ff9900>limited missions</color> \nto gain more rewards!
text.<color=#ff9900>スカウトレース</color>で<color=#f:
When you <color=#ff9900>win</color> a <color=#ff9900>Scout Race</color>, the team captain and members 
are registered in the <color=#ff9900>Roster</color>, and you will get a bonus to 
the entire team's stats and your Scout Pt. Further, by 
drafting specific combinations of horsegirls in your team 
you can obtain <color=#ff9900>Team Skills</color> upon victory.
text.<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: The <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color> lets you use double the TP \nat the start of training to double the amount of <color=#ff9900>Trial Coin</color> received at the end.
text.<color=#ff9900>ログインおさんぽボーナス</color>や<col:
You can fill the <color=#ff9900>Stroll Gauge</color> by playing <color=#ff9900>various parts of 
the game</color> or through the <color=#ff9900>stroll login bonus</color>. Once the gauge 
is at <color=#ff9900>MAX</color>, you can <color=#ff9900>take a stroll</color> with one of your horsegirls. 
 
※The gauge will fill from play after using your login bonus.
text.フォトスタジオでは、<color=#ff9900>トレーニング</color>、: With the Photo Studio you can take <color=#ff9900>photos \nat training, outings</color>, and various other settings.
text.フォトを撮影したいウマ娘を選択後、\\n<color=#ff9900>季節やお出: After selecting a horsegirl to photograph, you can set up \nthe <color=#ff9900>seasons, locations, and so on</color>. For <color=#ff9900>training photos</color> \npartners can also be selected.
text.フォトの撮影中は、<color=#ff9900>画面の一時停止・ループ</col: During shooting the action can be <color=#ff9900>paused or looped</color>. \nFind the perfect timing to snap your favourite shots! \nPhotos can also be <color=#ff9900>edited with filters and the like</color>.
text.おさんぽへ行くと<color=#ff9900>おさんぽ相手</color>のウマ:
Going for a stroll increases your <color=#ff9900>Stroll Partner's Friendship</color>. 
Different <color=#ff9900>destinations</color> will play unique animations and 
provide different <color=#ff9900>rewards</color>. During the campaign you can 
rewatch any animations you've seen by long-clicking 
a horsegirl.
text.「KIRARI MAGIC SHOW」キャンペーンページでは、\\nクリスマスプ:
On the KIRARI MAGIC SHOW campaign page you can check 
not only campaign info but from 21 December you can join 
in on the TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI collab event, as well as 
find a gift hiding in the <color=#ff9900>present box once a day</color>.
text.『東京メガイルミ』とコラボしたクリスマスライブをするため\\n大井レース場にやっ:
The horsegirls gather at the Ooi Racecourse for the 
TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI Christmas Live collab. But the 
MEGA TREE's decorations are lagging behind!? It's time 
for the horsegirls's power to shine☆ With everyone's help 
the MEGA TREE will be glittering in no time!
text.トレーニングに<color=#ff9900>ハッピーミークが登場！</color: <color=#ff9900>Happy Meek</color> will appear in training! \nWork together with her and aim to enter the URA Finals!
text.ランダムでハッピーミークとのトレーニング後に\\n基礎能力や体力の値を競い合う<: Training with her can trigger a <color=#ff9900>Duel</color> around a specific stat \nor energy level! The higher this chosen Duel Subject is, \nthe easier it will be to win the Duel, so train well!
text.育成期間中に一定回数対決で勝利を重ねると、\\n<color=#ff9900>パ: Should you manage to win a certain number of Duels, \na <color=#ff9900>stronger Happy Meek</color> will appear in the URA Finals! \nTrain your horsegirl to take victory on the Finals stage!
text.アオハル魂爆発が発生済みのチームメンバーにアオハル特訓が発生\\nした場合一度だ:
After a team member has had a Spirit Explosion, they can have 
one further <color=#ff9900>EX Spirit Explosion</color>! This will <color=#ff9900>grant them even more 
stats, as will your horsegirl, who will additionally receive a special 
skill hint</color>! EX Spirit Explosions add even more fire to your training!
text.<color=#ff9900>特殊な条件</color>を満たすと、アオハル杯に: Under <color=#ff9900>certain conditions</color>, you can face a <color=#ff9900>Powerhouse Team</color> in \nthe Aoharu Hai! When winning against this team your horsegirl \nwill grow considerably! <color=#ff9900>Something may happen in the finals</color> too…!?
text.東京メガイルミコラボイベント「KIRARI MAGIC SHOW」は\\n<co:
In the TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI collab event, KIRARI MAGIC 
SHOW, you will receive rewards for gathering <color=#ff9900>ornaments 
for the tree</color> from training and missions. Individual rewards 
will be handed out based on the amount you collect.
text.イベントに参加する全トレーナーでオーナメントを集めて、メガツ\\nリーを輝かせま:
With the <color=#ff9900>ornaments gathered by all trainers</color> we can make 
the MEGA TREE glitter as it should. Watch the <color=#ff9900>tree change</color> 
on the event homepage and help claim the extravagant 
global event rewards by collecting tons of ornaments!
text.本育成シナリオでは3年間三女神のサポートを活かしながら\\n育成ウマ娘ごとの目標:
Reach for your horsegirl's dreams over 3 years 
with the aid of the three goddesses! 
<color=#ff9900>Clear all goals to enter the special Grand Masters race!</color> 
Hold your own against the goddesses and aim for victory!
text.育成期間中にトレーニング、お休み、お出かけ、レースを行うと\\n三女神から<co:
The goddesses will bestow <color=#ff9900>Knowledge Shards</color> upon you 
when training, resting, going out, or racing! These shards 
will grant <color=#ff9900>increased stat gains</color> and other useful effects. 
<color=#ff9900>And friendship training grants 2 shards at once!?</color>
text.知識の欠片を2つ揃えると、追加で<color=#ff9900>知識の結晶</co: Every 2 <color=#ff9900>Knowledge Shards</color> will also grant a <color=#ff9900>Knowledge Crystal</color>! \nThese also bestow effects to improve your training. <color=#ff9900>Crystals inherit \neffects from their shards</color>, so pile them up and strengthen your horsegirl!
text.獲得した知識の欠片、知識の結晶は知識表にまとめられます。\\n知識表に全てまとめ:
Shards and Crystals collected show in the Knowledge Tree. 
Reach the end to obtain <color=#ff9900>Goddess's Wisdom</color>! Use this wisdom 
whenever you wish to <color=#ff9900>power up various actions for 1 turn</color>! 
The effects vary per goddess, so check the details in the tree.
text.最終目標レースのグランドマスターズが開催されるまでに、\\n<color=#ff: Before you can enter the Grand Masters, you will face a \n<color=#ff9900>special race at the end of each year</color>! Seize victory in all of \nthem with your horsegirl and the power of the goddesses!
text.グランドマスターズは1レースのみ行われる特別なレースで、\\n最高のライバルとし:
The Grand Masters is 1 special race, facing the ultimate rivals in 
the <color=#ff9900>three goddesses</color> themselves! <color=#ff9900>Darley Arabian, Godolphin Barb, 
and Byerley Turk</color> await! Challenge them with your well-trained 
horsegirl and seize victory!
text.本イベントには<color=#ff9901>メインステージ</color>と<c:
This event is divided in a <color=#ff9901>Main Stage</color> and an <color=#ff9901>Extra Stage</color>. 
In the Main Stage you take on races with a team of three. 
Based on how you do, your <color=#ff9901>League Score</color> will increase, 
and based on this score, your <color=#ff9901>League Rank</color> increases, 
granting various rewards!
text.<color=#ff9900>各コンテンツのプレイ</color>で<color: Fill the research gauge by <color=#ff9900>playing various content</color>. \nWhen the gauge is filled at least once, return to the event page \nto receive an amount of <color=#ff9900>research rewards</color> equal to gauge fills.
text.<color=#ff9900>ログイン満開ボーナス</color>や<color:
<color=#ff9900>The login bloom bonus</color>, <color=#ff9900>completing training</color>, and <color=#ff9900>entering stadium </color> 
will fill your <color=#ff9900>bloom gauge</color>. When the gauge is at <color=#ff9900>MAX</color> you can 
<color=#ff9900>move 1 cell further</color> on the main event page. 
 
※ The gauge will fill from play after using your bloom bonus.
text.マスを進めるごとに<color=#ff9900>ご当地エピソード</color>:
Upon moving cells, their <color=#ff9900>local episodes</color> are unlocked, and their 
<color=#ff9900>reward</color> acquired. On 4/2 & 4/3 at 12:00 a <color=#ff9900>new area</color> will unlock, 
allowing you to move into new cells. 
 
※ The bloom gauge won't fill if there are no new cells to move to.
text.育成ウマ娘の覚醒Lvを上げて解放したレアスキルは\\nそれぞれの条件を育成中に達:
During training, fulfilling the conditions for the Rare Skills 
unlocked by awakening a horsegirl allows you to upgrade 
them to powerful <color=#ff9900>Evolved Skills</color> unique to each horsegirl 
at the end of training.
text.研究成果報酬で獲得できる<color=#ff9900>因子研究レポート</col:
The <color=#ff9900>Factor Research Reports</color> obtained as rewards for research 
allow you to increase the <color=#ff9900>★</color> of a horsegirl's <color=#ff9900>factor</color>. 
※ Reports apply to most but not all factors. 
※ Reports don't carry over to next event.
text.<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: Using the <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color>, twice the TP will be used at the \nstart of training to double the <color=#ff9900>Research Gauge's fill rate</color>.
text.各エリアの最終マスは<color=#ff9900>目標地点</color>となっ: Each area's final cell is the <color=#ff9900>destination</color>. \nReaching it unlocks a <color=#ff9900>special video</color>. \nVideos are available from 4/1～4/3 at 19:00 and 4/4 at 12:00.
text.ウマいね！受付期間では、1レースごとに1人のウマ娘を\\n<color=#ff9: For a time you can <color=#ff9900>cheer for a horsegirl by hitting \nthe "Neighce!" button</color>! Doing so grants you some \n<color=#ff9900>neighce rewards</color> and can be done once per block (A-B).
text.エクストラステージのレースが開催されています！\\nA-Bブロックそれぞれのメイ: The Extra Stage has opened! You can watch the main race \nfor the A and B blocks and each race of your own team. \nWatching races grants rewards too!
text.サークルごとに<color=#ff9901>オリジナル名刺</color>を作成: Circles can create their own original <color=#ff9901>Circle Cards</color> and share \nthem as images on <color=#ff9901>social media</color>. These are customizable cards \nshowing the circle's details and other info.
text.<color=#ff9900>リーグチケット</color>は毎日12時に<co:
At <color=#ff9900>12am every day</color> you receive <color=#ff9900>5 League Tickets</color>, each of 
which grants entry to <color=#ff9900>5 races</color>. Each race features 5 teams, 
with the weather and going randomized every race. 
No other race conditions will change.
text.レースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>ヒーローゲージ</color>が:
With each entered race, your <color=#ff9900>Hero Gauge</color> will fill, 
and when MAXed you gain access to a <color=#ff9900>Hero Skill</color> 
for <color=#ff9900>5 races</color>! Some Hero Skills can be activated 
by using Race Items.
text.リーグランクは<color=#ff9900>BRONZE1～PLATINUM4<:
From <color=#ff9900>BRONZE1 to PLATINUM4</color>, there are 16 League Ranks. 
Reaching PLATINUM1 bestows a <color=#ff9900>unique title</color> featuring the 
name of one of your entered horsegirls. Which one can be 
freely chosen from those who meet the requirements. 
Battle varied teams on your way to PLATINUM!
text.獲得リーグスコアランキング<color=#ff9900>TOP96</color:
The teams whose League Score ranks in the top 96 can 
progress to the Extra Stage! This is composed of 12 races 
per block, for <color=#ff9900>24 races</color> total. Horsegirls entering these 
races are granted the <color=#ff9900>SUPER HERO</color> epithet! 
※Participation can be set in the options
text.エクストラステージのウマいね！受付期間では、\\n1レースごとに1人のウマ娘を<: In the Extra Stage you can cheer for a horsegirl \nby hitting the <color=#ff9900>"Neighce!"</color> button once per race. \nDoing so grants you some neighce rewards.
text.A-Bブロックのそれぞれ<color=#ff9900>第11レース</color:
In each block, the <color=#ff9900>11th race is the Main Race</color>. 
In A block this will be raced by the top 4 teams, 
in B block the 5th–8th placed ones. Watching the 
Main Race grants rewards. All 24 races can also 
be watched with the focus on 1 horsegirl.
text.特別移籍では、殿堂入りウマ娘を<color=#ff9901>他のチームに移籍させ:
Through Special Transfer you can <color=#ff9901>obtain gifts for transferring 
your trained horsegirls to another trainer's team</color>. 
Be aware you can't get horsegirls back once transferred! 
Ads are updated <color=#ff9901>every monday at 5:00</color>.
text.サークル名刺の編集は、<color=#ff9901>サークルリーダー</colo: Only Circle Leaders can change the <color=#ff9901>Circle Card</color>. \nCircle info, comments, and images can be added \nand customized to show the appeal of your circle!
text.本育成シナリオでは育成ウマ娘それぞれの目標はなく\\n<color=#ff990:
In this scenario horsegirls replace their individual goals with 
the shared goal of conquering the <color=#ff9900>Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe</color>! 
An opportunity to do so appears <color=#ff9900>once during the classic and 
senior year each</color>. Work hard and chase your dreams with the 
other Project L'Arc members to triumph at the arc!
text.重賞レースでの入着や、L'ArcメンバーとのSSマッチを開催\\nすることで<c:
Finishing graded races in the money and SS Matches with L'Arc 
members gets you <color=#ff9900>Supporter Pt</color> and increases <color=#ff9900>Fan Expectations</color>. 
Increased Expectations confers stat growth, a training bonus, 
and facility level ups to lead to further growth for your horsegirl!
text.海外のレース場でウマ娘が本来の能力を発揮するためには\\n<color=#ff9:
To unleash their true ability on foreign tracks it will 
be necessary to <color=#ff9900>gain or upgrade Foreign Aptitudes</color>. 
Amass Foreign Aptitudes by fulfilling their requirements 
and level them up to <color=#ff9900>complete tasks at Foreign Races</color>!
text.<color=#ff9900>海外のウマ娘との交流戦</color>が、育成中に:
<color=#ff9900>Friendly matches with foreign horsegirls</color> using VR at a virtual 
Longchamps are held 4 times during training. Like Foreign Races, 
these races <color=#ff9900>include tasks</color>. Supporter and Apt. Pt can be gained 
from them, so <color=#ff9900>raise those Foreign Aptitudes</color> and aim for victory!
text.SSマッチやレースの勝利など様々な条件を満たすと\\n<color=#ff990: You can <color=#ff9900>gain Foreign Apts.</color> through SS Matches \nand winning races. <color=#ff9900>The requirements for each vary</color> \nso check them out to gain as many as you can!
text.SSマッチや海外遠征で獲得できる<color=#ff9900>適性Pt</col:
The <color=#ff9900>Apt. Pt</color> gained through SS Matches and trips abroad can 
be used to <color=#ff9900>level up Foreign Apts.</color>! Leveling them up not only 
benefits your tasks but grants positive effects to aptitudes and 
bonuses in training. Gather Apt. Pt and level up aggressively!
text.L'Arcメンバーは、トレーニングやレースで<color=#ff9900>スター:
L'Arc members fill the <color=#ff9900>Star Gauge</color> through training and races, 
and <color=#ff9900>once it's full you can enter an SS Match</color>! SS Matches will 
take up a turn, but can be held with <color=#ff9900>up to 5 participants</color>, granting 
Supporter Pt and stats! You might also find yourself in an even 
more powerful <color=#ff9900>SSS Match</color> at times.
text.L'ArcメンバーとのSSマッチで勝利すると\\nメンバーごとに<color=#:
When winning an SS Match with L'Arc members, each member 
will <color=#ff9900>get a winning bonus</color>. Rewards are varied, including Skill Hints 
and Conditions, so take on the challenges of the SS Matches once 
you get a few members together!
text.7月前半から10月前半にかけての<color=#ff9900>海外遠征</col: From early July to early October a <color=#ff9900>Trip Abroad</color> will have you \nundergo <color=#ff9900>special training</color> in France. <color=#ff9900>You can gain tons of Apt. Pt</color> \nwhile abroad so it is a great chance to level up Foreign Apts.!
text.海外遠征期間中は、クラシック級9月前半には<color=#ff9900>ニエル賞:
During the Trip Abroad you will enter the <color=#ff9900>Prix Niel</color> 
and the <color=#ff9900>Prix Foy</color> in early September of the classic 
and senior year, respectively. These serve as trials 
for the <color=#ff9900>Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe</color> in early October!
text.<color=#ff9900>1日1回</color>スカウトレース10戦後、<:
<color=#ff9900>Once per day</color> you can enter a <color=#ff9900>special race</color> after 10 scout races. 
These special races don't consume a ticket and are raced against 
special NPC teams. Winning this race earns you a large amount 
of Scout Pts.
